answers.answer: you need to stop smoking! its so bad for the baby!! it stunts there growth and causes all sorts of problems... atleast cut back.

You know, I think that you are doing a great job trying to do what you can for yourself for the baby. But while I was pregnant with my son I was having a sharp pain inmy legs and found out that my son was pinching the siatic nerve that connects to my leg. Also , you shouldnt lay on your back, that may be something, it can cause harm to the baby if you do it for long periods at a time, and can be bad for you too while pregnant. While I was pregnant with my daughter, a week before i had her they had my go in for an ultrasound. And I had almost blacked out, I went dizzy, and I numbness around my face and legs because they had me on my back....I hope this helped...if not I will pray for you and I hope that everything will be ok!!

question: Hi I am 34 yrs old and about 20 weeks pregnant.  this Last couple of weeks I have been experiencing some sort of numbness in the right side of my body.  Also a headache and some dizziness.  I have not been able to digest food properly for approximately three years.  I smoke about a pack a day for over 15 yrs.  I just stopped drinking when i found out i was pregnant.  Before that i drank pretty regualarly for the last year or so.  I was taking zoloft for about a month to help with the smoking habit but since it wasnt helping i stopped taking them about a week ago. Every time i go to sleep the numbness and tingling wakes me up.  It was every other week then every other day now it is everytime i go to sleep or lie down for a long period of time.  Today the numbness was in my left side when i woke up which is the first time for the left side.  As far as i Know i have no diabetes  or any thing like it.  I have had blood work recently from obgyn.  I went to the emergency room this morning and was sent for a ct scan and an ultra sound of the carotid arteries.  They both came back normal.  Further testing was not reccommended at this point because of the potential harm to the baby.  I read an article that had me concerned that i was having a stroke because of my symptoms.  The doctor in the er didnt seem to think so because of my age mostly.  One of the er nurses suggested that the baby could be laying on a nerve, but the doctor said that wouldnt cause numbness in my arm..  I am confused afraid for the life of myself and my unborn and dont know what to do.  I am going to talk to my obgyn tommorwo about this which i hadnt mentioned as of yet because it wasnt as serious and i just forgot to tell him.  Any help would grateful in trying to determine what steps i should take in finding out what is wrong or if anyone knows what is wrong based on what i have written.
title: what wrong with me
